questions.question:
The structure of an organic compound is shown below:

![](images/Topic11/dse2012-28-1766483120917-inline-q-qimg-1766483097112-5343-mjiegrzr-2278.png)

Which of the following statements is correct?

options.content: The compound does NOT show enantiomerism
The molecular formula of the compound is C<sub>5</sub>H<sub>6</sub>O<sub>4</sub>
The compound contains a ketone group
The compound can be oxidised by acidified K<sub>2</sub>Cr<sub>2</sub>O<sub>7</sub>(aq)
